sentences.english: The origin of the abnormal psychology crime is that the crime actor's spirit is unusual.
sentences.chinese: 变态心理犯罪的根源是犯罪行为人的精神异常。

sentences.english: Suffering from schizophrenia or mental abnormalities do.
sentences.chinese: 患有精神分裂症或有精神异常者不做。

sentences.english: Man has used drugs to celebrate heroic successes.
sentences.chinese: 人类曾经用药物来庆祝神异的成功。

sentences.english: These are the eyes of a psychopath.
sentences.chinese: 那是精神异常者的眼睛。

sentences.english: Dragon is a deified animal worshipped by the Chinese people from the time immemorial.
sentences.chinese: 龙是中华民族自上古以来一直崇尚的神异动物。

sentences.english: Researchers are saying that caffeine withdrawal should now be classified as a psychiatric disorder.
sentences.chinese: 研究人员认为咖啡因吊瘾应归为精神异常方面的疾病。

sentences.english: The old man next door has been suffering from mental disorder for years.
sentences.chinese: 隔壁邻居的老人经年来饱受精神异常折磨。

sentences.english: I have always been in a state of mental abnormality.
sentences.chinese: 我一直一直处于精神异常的状态下。

sentences.english: But precarious mental health is not the only risk for long-term addiction.
sentences.chinese: 但精神异常并非长期上瘾的唯一风险。

definition: to communicate with the spirits/psychic/(ears) sensitive/(information) accurate
to know all under heaven/exceptionally talented (idiom)
the distant past/ancient times/antiquity/early historical times
sth else/a separate matter/not the same thing/with different jobs (not colleagues)/a remarkable thing/sth special/an odd thing/sth strange or incomprehensible

four divinities/four divine emperors/four mythical creatures symbolic of prosperity and longevity, namely the phoenix 鳳|凤[feng4], turtle 龜|龟[gui1], dragon 龍|龙[long2] and Chinese unicorn 麒麟[qi2 lin2]/also 四象[si4 xiang4], the four division of the sky
abstruse/profound mystery/the mysteries of the universe
